content.html: my family was just forced to vote at gunpoint in russian cosplay of a “referendum” in southern ukraine: - they come to your house - you have to openly tick the box for being annexed by russia (or for staying with ukraine if you feel suicidal) - all while armed gunmen watch you
content.value:
my family was just forced to vote at gunpoint in russian cosplay of a “referendum” in southern ukraine:

- they come to your house
- you have to openly tick the box for being annexed by russia (or for staying with ukraine if you feel suicidal) 
- all while armed gunmen watch you
